name: Verify user is able to create new SD Admin role user

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to create new SD Admin role user ({First Name=Automation, Last Name=Testing, Role=SD Admin})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
When User click on login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Given User click on "Create New User" button
Then User navigates to create user page
And User enter random email in "userEmail"
And User select "SD Admin" from "Role" in "Users" tab

userStory.storyName: Creation of user in SMT application
userStory.displayName: Creation of user in SMT application
userStory.narrative: We will be using this feature file for create user functionality validations in SMT application mentioning all possible scenarios for SD Admin role user.

featureTag.name: SD admin/Creation of user in SMT application
featureTag.displayName: SD admin/Creation of user in SMT application

title: Verify user is able to create new SD Admin role user

tags.name: Sd admin/Creation of user in SMT application
tags.displayName: Creation of user in SMT application

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User click on "Create New User" button
Then User navigates to create user page
And User enter "<First Name>" in "firstName"
And User enter "<Last Name>" in "lastName"
And User enter random email in "userEmail"
And User select "<Role>" from "Role" in "Users" tab
When User click on "Submit" button
And User wait for "5" seconds
Then User is created successfully
